searchQuery.title: Search Query
searchQuery.description: What to search for on Google Maps (e.g., 'restaurants', 'hotels', 'coffee shops')

location.title: Location
location.description: Where to search (e.g., 'Dubai', 'Kuwait City', 'Manama, Bahrain'). Leave empty to use Google's auto-detection.

maxResults.title: Maximum Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of businesses to scrape. Set to 0 for unlimited. Default is 100.

scrapeDetails.title: Scrape Business Details
scrapeDetails.description: Visit each business page to extract detailed information (address, phone, website, hours). This takes longer but provides complete data.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for the scraper. Residential proxies are highly recommended for Google Maps to avoid blocking.

minDelay.title: Minimum Delay (seconds)
minDelay.description: Minimum delay between actions in seconds

maxDelay.title: Maximum Delay (seconds)
maxDelay.description: Maximum delay between actions in seconds

language.title: Language
language.description: Language code for Google Maps results (e.g., 'en' for English, 'ar' for Arabic, 'fr' for French). Uses Google's hl parameter.

debugScreenshots.title: Debug Screenshots
debugScreenshots.description: Capture screenshots when errors occur for debugging purposes. Useful for troubleshooting but increases storage usage.

skipSponsored.title: Skip Sponsored Listings
skipSponsored.description: When enabled, skip all sponsored/ad listings and only return organic results.

skipWithWebsite.title: Skip Listings With Website
skipWithWebsite.description: When enabled, only return listings that do NOT have a website. Useful for finding businesses without web presence for lead generation.

skipWithPhone.title: Skip Listings With Phone
skipWithPhone.description: When enabled, only return listings that do NOT have a phone number. Useful for finding businesses with incomplete contact info.

skipWithoutContact.title: Skip Listings Without Contact Info
skipWithoutContact.description: When enabled, skip listings that have neither a phone number nor email address. Only return listings with at least one contact method.

extractReviews.title: Extract Reviews
extractReviews.description: When enabled, extract reviews for each business listing. This significantly increases scraping time as it requires visiting each business and loading all reviews.

maxReviews.title: Maximum Reviews Per Business
maxReviews.description: Maximum number of reviews to extract per business. Set to 0 or leave empty for unlimited (all reviews). Default is unlimited.

extractReviewShareLink.title: Extract Review Share Links
extractReviewShareLink.description: When enabled, extract the shareable link for each review. This adds extra time as it requires clicking the share button for each review.
